creatorName.description: The name of this project's creator.

tuningPrefix.description: Text to prepend to generated tuning file names.

allowFolderCreation.description: Whether or not the S4TK extension is allowed to create missing folders in order to output to `destinations`.

sourceFolder.description:
Absolute or relative path to the folder that contains all of the resources for this project. If omitted, then the root of this project is considered to be the source folder.

Both Windows and Unix paths are accepted; they will be automatically converted as needed.

destinations.description:
List of absolute and/or relative paths to folders where all built packages should be output to.

Both Windows and Unix paths are accepted; they will be automatically converted as needed.

packages.description: List of packages to build. If omitted or empty, then all files will be built to a single package that is named using the values in `projectInfo`.

filename.description: What to name the built package file (if the `.package` extension is omitted, it will be inserted).

include.description:
List of absolute and/or relative (to the source folder) glob patterns that capture all files that should be built into this package.

Both Windows and Unix paths are accepted; they will be automatically converted as needed.

stringTables.description: Data related to the string table(s) in this project.

defaultLocale.description: The locale that the source strings are written in.

defaultPath.description:
Absolute or relative path to the string table (binary or JSON) that serves as the default for this project. Strings added via commands will be added to this string table.

Both Windows and Unix paths are accepted; they will be automatically converted as needed.

generateMissingLocales.description: Whether or not to generate string tables for all missing locales (using the text from the default locale).

newStringsToTop.description: Whether or not to insert strings generated via commands to the top of the string table, rather than to the end.

onePerPackage.description: Whether or not all of the string tables being written to the same package should be merged.

settings.description: Optional settings that affect how the S4TK extension works.

showCopyConfirmation.description: Whether or not to show a popup to confirm when something has been copied to your clipboard.
